text: Vitaliy Balytskyi (; 22 August 1978 – 23 July 2018) was a Ukrainian football player and manager. ==References== ==External links== *Profile at FFU * Category:1978 births Category:People from Khmelnytskyi, Ukraine Category:2018 deaths Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:FC Advis Khmelnytskyi players Category:FC Podillya Khmelnytskyi players Category:FC CSKA Kyiv players Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:FC Arsenal Kyiv players Category:FC Spartak Vladikavkaz players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:FC Volyn Lutsk players Category:FC Zirka Kropyvnytskyi players Category:FC Nyva Vinnytsia players Category:CFR Cluj players Category:Expatriate footballers in Romania Category:FC Nafkom Brovary players Category:FC Knyazha Shchaslyve players Category:FC Dynamo Khmelnytskyi players Category:FC Komunalnyk Luhansk players Category:Association football defenders
title: Vitaliy Balytskyi
